triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The survey comprehensively reviews reinforcement learning approaches for autonomous UAV networks.

triples.name: Unmanned aerial vehicle
triples.relevance: UAVs are the primary systems that the survey focuses on for autonomous multi-UAV wireless networks.

triples.name: Wireless network
triples.relevance: The survey addresses wireless network formation and management as a core problem for multi-UAV systems.

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: Multi-agent reinforcement learning frameworks are essential for coordinating multiple autonomous UAVs.

triples.name: Autonomous system
triples.relevance: The survey focuses on achieving autonomous operation of UAV networks without human intervention.
